openstack_blockstorage_volume_v3.description: Manages a V3 volume resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to create the volume. If

size.description: The size of the volume to create (in gigabytes).

enable_online_resize.description: When this option is set it allows extending

availability_zone.description: The availability zone for the volume.

consistency_group_id.description: The consistency group to place the volume

description.description: A description of the volume. Changing this updates

image_id.description: The image ID from which to create the volume.

metadata.description: Metadata key/value pairs to associate with the volume.

name.description: A unique name for the volume. Changing this updates the

snapshot_id.description: The snapshot ID from which to create the volume.

source_replica.description: The volume ID to replicate with.

source_vol_id.description: The volume ID from which to create the volume.

volume_type.description: The type of volume to create.

multiattach.description: Allow the volume to be attached to more than one Compute instance.
